message.body: Hey man- would you be into doing an hour lesson on Monday afternoon, instead of a half hour today?
Mondays i'm booked 1 to 530, i'm free monday mornings 10 to 1230
Or we could do an hour next tuesday

Let's do that instead. 1hr next Tuesday, normal time. 5-6pm. We'll work on scales that were for today, and I'll find some easy beginner trumpet duets for us to read through for the rest of the time. It'll be a scene...
